## WebAuthContainer.loginOAuthProviderWithRedirect() method

Login user with OAuth SSO provider by redirecting user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loginOAuthProviderWithRedirect(providerID: string, callbackURL: string, options?: SSOLoginOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  providerID | <code>string</code> | SSO provider ID |
|  callbackURL | <code>string</code> | URL to return when authentication completed |
|  options | <code>SSOLoginOptions</code> | SSO login options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
